Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add visual Exclusion Builder LWC for v1.0

Introduces a user-friendly Lightning Web Component that allows Admins to build
JSON exclusion rules visually without manual JSON editing. The component
dynamically adapts to the org''s schema by fetching objects, fields, and
picklist values at runtime.

Features:
- ExclusionBuilderController.cls with 4 Apex methods for schema metadata
- Smart input rendering \(picklist dropdown, boolean toggle, text input\)
- Field-type-aware operator filtering
- Datatable display of current rules with remove action
- Saves to BehaviorIQ_Configuration__c.Global_Exclusion_Filter__c

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

- Wire dynamic data in behaviorIQDashboard LWC replacing static "12,450" value

- Format Last Scan timestamp dynamically with "Today/Yesterday" logic
